wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Robert Auld  (1 October 1848 – 17 February 1911) was a British Army officer who became Lieutenant Governor of Guernsey.

response: * Robert Auld (British Army officer) (1848–1911), lieutenant-governor of Guernsey from 1908 to 1911
